quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it. – Henry Ford
fact: The shortest British monarch was Charles I, who was 4 feet 9 inches.
joke: Did you know crocodiles could grow up to 15 feet? But most just have 4.
